display.title: Sterilized Cleanroom
description: The &&aSterilized Cleanroom&&r is required to produce the next tier of circuits. Nearly every step must be performed inside of one. Good luck fitting everything into such a tight space!
If you only have one &&3Cleanroom&&r, you'll need another for &&aSterilized&&r recipes.
&&eNote&&r: Normal Cleanroom recipes cannot run in the Sterilized Cleanroom, so you can't just "upgrade" your old Cleanrooms.
